name: Sir Jumpelot
description:
My entry for the GitHub Game off 2016The theme was Hacking / Modding / Augmenting, so i made a game that mods itself.

When the once so peaceful land get's cursed, the camping days of Sir Jumpelot are over.

Survive the different game mods that keep on changing the game, and make
sure to jump on those enemies to increase your score!

How long can you postpone Sir Jumpelot's terrible fate?

Music Support(Open GameArt)

(title)Autumn Forest = VocalMix
(game)Battle in the Winter = jobromedia
(end)Prologue = Forester
(disco)"Funky Gameplay" by Eric Matyas Soundimage.org
